messages.message:
Hi all -- I found two API keys used for local dev that are checked into Git:

```azure_form_recognizer_api_key
azure_text_translator_api_key```
I am removing these, and adding them to the Crafting secrets instead. If you have problems with these -- update your Crafting sandbox.

By removal are u rotating the secret ?

Azure endpoints usually provide 2 different api keys, so for crafting we an use the second api key or a completely new endpoint.
FYI: SAAS moved out of the api_key which is checked into git. If crafting is also out we should just rotate the api_key and possibly the endpoint as well
